executable.title: Compute Background Intensity
executable.description: Sample the background of a slide to compute the median background intensity.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the HistomicsTK project.

file.name: slide_path
file.label: Input Slide
file.description: Path to input slide image to be deconvolved

float.name: sample_percent
float.label: Sample Percent
float.description: Percentage of pixels to sample. Specify either this or --sampleApproximateTotal

float.name: magnification
float.label: Magnification
float.description: Desired magnification for sampling. Leave unspecified for native scan magnification.

float.name: tissue_seg_mag
float.label: Segmentation Magnification
float.description: Low resolution magnification at which foreground and background will be segmented.

float.name: min_coverage
float.label: Minimum Coverage
float.description: Minimum background coverage required for a tile to be sampled from.

integer.name: sample_approximate_total
integer.label: Approximate sample total
integer.description: Use instead of sample_percent to specify roughly how many pixels to sample. The fewer tiles are excluded, the more accurate this will be.
